lines.text: My younger brother, Ghama Zabi who was beloved by you all, is dead! Why?
Because he was a stupid kid.
Even my dad never hit me!
No one likes to admit to them. To the mistakes caused by their youth.
This isn't a Zaku you're fighting, pal! Not a Zaku!
But no Zaku can go this fast! One of them is closing at three-times normal speed!
Now, let's see how good that Feddie mobile suit really is.
A mobile suit's abilities don't decide a battle's outcome. I'll teach you that!
Damn it! Is that Feddie suit a monster?
